bioconda.name: tesorter
bioconda.summary: Lineage-level classification of transposable elements using conserved protein domains.

biocontainers.name: tesorter
biocontainers.summary: Lineage-level classification of transposable elements using conserved protein domains.

biotools.summary:
lineage-level classification of transposable elements using conserved protein domains.

Note: do not move or hard link TEsorter.py alone to anywhere else, as it rely on database/ and bin/. You can add the directory to PATH or soft link TEsorter.py to PATH

bioschemas.name: TEsorter
bioschemas.summary:
lineage-level classification of transposable elements using conserved protein domains.
